channel.title: Can I get a sure answer (NO RAPTORS, NOR JESUS)
channel.description: From the operators of Mopar rsc. Will we get to play the server before 2012? Serious and honest answer, please.

item.title: Can I get a sure answer (NO RAPTORS, NOR JESUS)
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“Motaro, post:24, topic:405660”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=502654.msg3686660#msg3686660 date=1311890748]
When I host this server, I will be the only one with access to it (to stop abuse, item spawning, stat modification, things like that). Obviously the source code is there for anyone else to use as well.

It will be set up, probably fairly soon.
[/quote]

How soon is fairly soon?[/quote]By this point im ready to give up on rsc…

Read full topic
